attributes.action: Bring home our troops from Afganistan.
attributes.additional_details: Brave young men and women are loosing there lives on the pretence that they are preventing terrorism in the UK .People with knowlege and experience who have studied the subject all over the world for many years say that this is nonesense.The best way to stop terrorist from entering and operating in this country is to get back control of our own borders.I am sure this would save lives and be more effective than  trying to do it in a country full of religous fanatics on the other side of the world

rejection.details: The e-petition that already exists is titled "Pull out of Afghanistan immediately to halt further troop injuries and deaths".
